casebody.data:
John A. DEVENDOR and William A. Devendor, Plaintlffs-Appellants, v. C. & C. BUTTON & TRIMMING COMPANY, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 382. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 30, 1939. Clarence M. Crews, of New York City, for appellants. Samuel E. Darby, Jr., of New York City (Donald J. Overocker, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

_ Before SWAN, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed on opinion below, D. C., 27 F.Supp. 38.
